name: CubesScrubsBlues
description:
You play as a cube, placed on strangely shaped rooms, somewhere in the void. You don't know how or why you ended up there, but there's one thing clear on your mind,  the urge to SCRUB any BLUE thing out of their color.

Bleach blue tiles in 9 different levels, each with their own unique way/s to completely get rid of the blue tiles in it. Once you completely SCRUBBED all of the blue tiles in each level, there's a small surprise for you somewhere in the menus.

!NOTE!

I highly recommend downloading and playing the Desktop or the Android version of the game as those versions are tested out. There might be some bugs in the HTML version.

!CREDITS!
